name: HELLENIC TIMES
description:
It's a simple Third Person, you are Teado a warrior master of the blades of a now forgotten era and you find yourself in an enemy outpost where you must recover the stolen taliman. 

--------------------------------------

Controls:

 Keyboard / Gamepad

WASD  / Left Thumbstick - Move 

Mouse  /  Right Thumbstick - Look

Space Bar / A - Jump

Left Shift / RB - Sprint

LMB / X - Action 

ESC / Start - Pausa
